function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of correlation analysis between age and KAP variables","Impact":"Inability to fully understand the impact of age on COVID-19-related practices","Mitigation":"Conduct further analysis to include age as a variable in correlation studies","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for correlation","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Reliance on previous studies for evidence of age correlation with COVID-19 practices","Impact":"Potential for outdated or incomplete information influencing decision-making","Mitigation":"Collect current data on age correlation with COVID-19 practices","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Research team, data collectors","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Need for comprehensive health education program related to COVID-19 prevention and control","Impact":"Inadequate knowledge and awareness among target groups, leading to ineffective prevention and control efforts","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a targeted health education program for specific groups","Technologies":"Education and communication technologies","People":"Policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Government and healthcare organizations"}]}
